attributes.action: Make schools start at 10am to give time for children to get prepared.
attributes.additional_details: It's unfair for children to be rushed out of the house and into school.
attributes.background: We should make school start later because at 8:30 I don't think children have enough time to get ready and go to school which is causing late marks.

rejection.details:
The length of the school day are decisions for schools and their governing bodies to make.

If you would like the Department for Education to issue guidelines, or impose requirements on schools, about the length of the school day you could start a petition asking for that.
